comments.body:
Why has this changed?
What's needed to support checkmode again?

when doing this update I realized that my original code said it supported check mode, but in reality, it didn't, hence the change. All the Pure modules don't support check mode. When I first wrote these I didn't understand what check mode really was so just assumed we supported it.
check_mode was explained to me by someone else in  another PR and I was told not to have it set as true due to the structure of my modules
